name: Moggle
body:
# Moggle

Moggle is currently is split up in three parts:

1. Moggle Math [Header only]
   Provides matrix and vector types, and everything that's related.
   Does not depend on OpenGL or on another part of Moggle, so can be used separately.

2. Moggle Core [Header only]
   A very thin wrapper around OpenGL. Provides classes such as 'vbo', 'vao' and 'shader'.

3. Moggle XXX
   A very sexy and easy way to use OpenGL.
   It has advanced features such as shader pipelines and more.

This page will some day contain links to documentation for these three libraries.
